00176 
00177 inline CVector2d CVector2d::GetHorizontalTranslated(double offsetX) const
00178 {
00179        return CVector2d(GetX() + offsetX, GetY());

00181 
00182 
00183 inline CVector2d CVector2d::GetVerticalTranslated(double offsetY) const

00187 
00188 
00189 inline double CVector2d::GetCrossProductZ(const imath::TVector<2>& vector) const
00190 {
00191        return GetX() * vector[1] - GetY() * vector[0];
00192 }
00193 
00194 
00195 inline double CVector2d::GetAngle() const
00196 {
00197        return qAtan2(GetY(), GetX());
00198 }
00199 
00200 
00201 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator-() const
00202 {
00203        return CVector2d(-GetX(), -GetY());

00214 
00215 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator-(const imath::TVector<2>& vector) const

00222 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator*(double scalar) const
00223 {
00224        return CVector2d(GetX() * scalar, GetY() * scalar);
00225 }

00229 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator/(double scalar) const
00230 {
00231        if (qAbs(scalar) < I_BIG_EPSILON){
00232               scalar = (scalar > 0)? I_BIG_EPSILON: -I_BIG_EPSILON;
00233        }
00234 
00235        return CVector2d(GetX() / scalar, GetY() / scalar);
00236 }
